item.description:
Join us for D&D Encounters: Dark Legacy of Evard. Bring your own characters made with Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, Heroes of the Fallen Lands, Players Option: Heroes of Shadow, or any article content in Dragon Magazine that supports these products to make a character. Alternatively, pre-generated characters will be provided.

Currently, all characters in the current season are at level 2. If you're just joining us, give your character starting equipment appropriate for a level 2 character (one level 3 magic item, one level 2 magic item, and one level 1 magic item, plus 360 gold; all items should be compatible with the sources listed above).
item.name: D&D Encounters: Dark Legacy of Evard
